name: Iwebalize
overview:
Iwebalize is known to be an E-marketing pioneer in the Middle East with a team that includes some of the top experts in this field. We are a global web marketing agency and we came up with the concept of â€˜Webalizaionâ€™. With this concept we aim at â€˜webalizingâ€™ businesses so that their digital presence may be enhanced. We help businesses market themselves over the web, build a brand name, attract more potential customers and convert them into paying clients.

We are a US-based joint venture between Nile PPC and Cartel Capital, with offices in Egypt and USA. We are currently in the process of tapping the potential of emerging markets.

Our reputation in Egypt is of a qualified and successful internet marketing expert and a Google adwords professional. Our excellent design and management teams, our state-of-the-art technology and our various awards and certifications have given us a prestigious place in the online marketing industry. We have a certification for Google adwords partner and also for Microsoft ad center. We are also a certified Google analytics individuals. In fact, we are the first certified Google adwords partner in Egypt and the MENA region. Also, we are the only company to receive a certification for the Microsoft AdExcellence Program in the MENA region.

Our marketing agency possesses young, dynamic talent that come up with creative, groundbreaking web marketing strategies to tap the potential of the internet. With the latest web marketing tools and a deep understanding of the dynamic market trends, we strive to offer the best online solutions to all our clients.
